prompt: Summarize the following story in first person: when I was on a bus and witnessed how the driver was killed to rob everyone there. they were moments of great tension because apparently the assailant was shot. they stole everything they could and then left as if nothing. leaving the body of the thrown driver. I helped at that moment by lifting the body so that they would take care of him in the hospital. Then wait to see how everything turned out. They gave us the worst news, the driver had passed away. It was somewhat traumatic after that incident suffered post-traumatic stress. I had a hard time getting out of that situation. but with will I succeeded. I guess they are experiences. things that have to happen and that leave a lesson. Everything is in the mind. and well nobody will return the driver's life. It was a very unfortunate moment for him.

choices.text: but it was also a lesson for me. I learned to appreciate life more. to be more careful with my things. and to be more aware of my surroundings.
